Bernie Sanders ( I., Vt.), who spoke for eight-and-a-half hours on the Senate floor on Dec. 10 against an extension of the Bush-era tax cuts for upper-income Americans, is publishing the entire oration in a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. said. If those preteens aren't brave enough to massacre their elders, they probably won't survive the auditions, which will be held live before 4,000 or 5,000 people in an arena. It was supposed to be similar to them doing their first concert, Simon Cowell explained. "It really helped show me who could handle the pressure." Simon Cowell claims that allowing the crowd to react in real time will help him avoid overlooking another big star.

prepares to open the first dealership in Los Angeles Monday and deliver the first batch of special edition Prima Edizione Fiat 500s next month. Sergio Marchionne , CEO of both Chrysler and Fiat, said the Fiat 500 doesn't have ambitions to conquer the U.S. market. It was designed for select areas. Volumes are small. Of 120,000 units to be built annually at Chrysler's Toluca, Mexico, plant, half are for North America and the rest are bound for Brazil and China. The

her eyes. "When her husband saw her making this effort he urged her and said Gabrielle Giffords open your eyes, open your eyes. And sure enough she did," said Kirsten Gillibrand . I was there when she was surrounded by her friends in the Congress and Senate. And I think it was a combination, perhaps, of the unexpected and the familiar that really prompted her to open her eyes and look around, said her doctor, Dr. Michael Lemole. But it was Gabrielle Giffords ' husband's reaction to this milestone that made Kirsten Gillibrand realize this was the very first time Gabrielle Giffords had opened her eyes since being shot.
